name: strripos
purpose: Find position of last occurrence of a case-insensitive string in a string

return.description:
Returns the numerical position of the last occurrence of
   needle. Also note that string positions start at 0,
   and not 1.If needle is not found, FALSE is returned.This function may
return Boolean FALSE, but may also return a non-Boolean value which
evaluates to FALSE, such as 0 or
"". Please read the section on Booleans for more
information. Use the ===
operator for testing the return value of this
function.
